traits.name: Acoustic Arcanist
traits.description: Your magic flows through melody and vibration. After playing an instrument at an inn, your sonic spells become <20%> more powerful. However, your booming presence makes hiring followers more expensive, and your reliance on sound magic weakens your physical attacks by <15%>.

traits.name: Addict
traits.description: You've developed some bad habits. Skooma and alcohol benefits last <2x> as long and you can craft skooma at cooking pot. When not under the effects of alcohol or skooma, you have a <25%> chance to get staggered when hit.

traits.name: Adrenaline Rush
traits.description: You possess a natural flight response. When at less than <20%> health, you move <20%> faster and regenerate <1> stamina per second but also deal <30%> less damage when below this threshold.

traits.name: Angler
traits.description: Your bond with the sea grants unique benefits. Mudcrabs and slaughterfish become friendly toward you. Fishing yields more valuable items. Fishing rods deal double damage and have a chance to summon a mudcrab to fight at your side. The summoned mudcrab becomes stronger if you're carrying an insect or small fish. Fishing rods can be enchanted. However, your affinity with the waters leaves you <10%> more vulnerable to shock damage.

effects.condition: negative effect, recovery effect, scales with power

traits.name: Au Naturel
traits.description: Embrace your divine gifts! Start with <+100> health, magicka, and stamina. For each piece of armor or clothing you wear, you lose <40> from each attribute (up to a maximum loss of <-160> with four pieces equipped). Additionally, you gain +1 to health, magicka, and stamina per level for each empty armor slot (head, chest, hands, and feet).

traits.name: Bad Natured
traits.description: You were born into wickedness. Your attacks while being crouched deals <20%> more and you're better at pickpocketing. However, attacks while standing up do <20%> less and wearing a divine amulet will hurt you.

traits.name: Balanced Casting
traits.description: Pick a resistance (fire, frost, shock, poison or magic). Both you and enemies within <200> feet have this resistance reduced by <25%>.

traits.name: Bane of the Wicked
traits.description: You are an enemy to all things abhorrent. Deal <20%> more damage to undead, daedra and werewolves. However, do <10%> less damage to other beings.

traits.name: Big Swing
traits.description: Power attacks are <25%> stronger, but light attacks are <25%> weaker.

traits.name: Blighted Fists
traits.description: Your afflictions fuel your fury! Your unarmed attacks deal <+10> unresistable disease damage per disease.

traits.name: Blood Warrior
traits.description: You take <50%> more physical damage and have <100%> weakness to Poison. However you start with <+100> health and gain <+5> health per level.

traits.name: Bulwark
traits.description: When walking or standing still, you gain <200> armor rating and reflect <10%> physical damage. You drain <1> additional stamina per second while sprinting and <0.25> when running.

traits.name: Defiler
traits.description: The only use you have for the living is to resurrect them in death. Deal <20%> more damage to playable races. However, do <10%> less damage to other beings.

traits.name: Disbeliever
traits.description: You reject the influence of gods, placing your faith in logic and reason instead. Dwemer weapons and armor are <33%> stronger, but you cannot receive blessings from shrines or divines.

traits.name: Disciplined
traits.description: Shoot to kill. Bows and crossbows deal <20%> more damage. However, they draw/reload <40%> slower.

traits.name: Dominating Will
traits.description: Your presence commands fear, intimidation checks almost always succeed, and frenzy spells are <20%> stronger. However, your persuasive charm is lacking, making persuasion checks harder, and your pacifying spells are <20%> weaker.

traits.name: Dovah Tinvaak
traits.description: You are fluent in Dragon speech and as such can shout <10%> more often, at <20%> reduced effectiveness.

traits.name: Druid
traits.description: Druids are attuned to nature, making spriggans friendly and reducing the cost of druidic spells by up to <30%>. You can craft <Lifebloom Essence> from Taproot and Spriggan Sap for powerful regeneration. However, your bond with the wild leaves you <25%> more vulnerable to fire and axes.

effects.condition: negative effect, recovery effect, scales with power

traits.name: Elemental Conduit
traits.description:
Fire spells are more powerful in sunny weather but lose potency in the rain. 
Shock spells are enhanced during rain but are less effective in snowy conditions. 
Frost spells excel in snowy weather but weaken under sunny skies.

traits.name: Fast Shot
traits.description: You'd rather shoot fast than shoot hard. Bows draw <40%> faster, crossbows reload <40%> faster. However, bows and crossbows deal <30%> less damage.

traits.name: Fatal Attraction
traits.description: Your presence is as dangerous as it is alluring. You can choose one gender, you deal <20%> more physical damage to the selected gender, but in turn, take <20%> more from the other.

traits.name: Fencer
traits.description: Light melee attacks are <25%> stronger, but power attacks are <25%> weaker.

traits.name: Focused
traits.description: When in danger, you think before acting. When at less than <20%> health, you regenerate <5> magicka per second and absorb <10%> of incoming spells. However, you take <10%> more damage when below this threshold.

traits.name: Focused Combat
traits.description: Pick onehanded, Twohanded or Marksman. Deal <10%> more damage with this weapon type. However, you deal <25%> less damage from the other two.

traits.name: Focused Magic
traits.description: Pick one school of magic, spells from that school are <25%> stronger or last <25%> longer but cost <10%> more. However, the remaining 4 schools are <50%> weaker.

traits.name: Focused Precision
traits.description: Your reliance on careful aim comes at a cost. Arrows and bolts deal <15%> less damage, but have a <20%> chance to push targets away. The strength of this pushback scales with your Marksman skill.

traits.name: Gambler
traits.description: You go in all or nothing. Gain <50%> chance to critical hit. However, overall weapon damage is reduced by <40%>. When you land a critical hit, your attacks do <10%> more damage for <30> seconds (stackable up to <5> times).

traits.name: Giantkin
traits.description: Descended from the mighty giants; you gain <10%> magic resistance and damage with blunt weapons, however you cannot read skill books, or use scrolls and staves.

traits.name: Glutton
traits.description: You LOVE food but hate medicine. Food benefits are <25%> stronger but potions have only <50%> their efficiency.

traits.name: Good Natured
traits.description: You have a good heart. Deal <20%> less damage with weapons and Destruction spells. However, while wearing an amulet of the divines beneficial spells and potions last <20%> longer and you take <20%> less damage.

traits.name: Hoarder
traits.description: You love carrying stuff around, even if it's junk. Gain <+200> carryweight. Selling prices are <50%> worse.

traits.name: Homeowner
traits.description: You've secured a place to call your own, choosing one of Skyrim's fine homes to settle in. However, comfort comes at a cost: each week, you must make a mortgage payment based on the home's value.

traits.name: Introvert
traits.description: You thrive in solitude but falter in the crowd. When facing three or fewer enemies, you deal <15%> more damage, whether with weapons or Destruction magic. Against four or more, your nerves get the better of you, and you deal <10%> less.

traits.name: Iron Knees
traits.description: You take <50%> less damage from enemy arrows and bolts. Getting hit with an arrow restores <20> stamina. However, you move <10%> slower.

traits.name: Jack of All Spells
traits.description: But master of none. Novice, Apprentice and Adept spells are <20%> stronger or longer lasting, expert and master spells are <20%> weaker or shorter.

traits.name: King of Worms
traits.description: You've gained hidden insight into necromantic arts. You can have <1> additional summon or undead thrall. However, the duration of summon and resurrecting spells is reduced by <33%>.

traits.name: Light Foot
traits.description: You've never felt comfortable in footwear. When not wearing boots/shoes, your movement is muffled, you move <5%> faster and suffer no fall damage. When wearing boots/shoes you move <10%> slower.

traits.name: Lurker
traits.description: When not wearing any clothes sneak attacks deal <2.5> times more damage and can sneak <25%> better. Eating fish when it's raw and wriggling triggers a powerful healing effect that lasts <10> minutes. However, armor provides no protection, cooked food offers no benefits, and weapons with a weight above 10 will deal no damage.

traits.name: Marathon Runner
traits.description: You regenerate <5> stamina per second while sprinting. However, you will not be able to gain any stamina while running or standing still.

traits.name: Master of Destiny
traits.description: You reject the influence of fate and star signs. Standing Stones cannot be used, but you begin the game with <3> additional perk points and a permanent <+5> boost to all skills.

traits.name: Nosferatu
traits.description: You're an ugly sight and live in the sewers. <-50> speech, no health, magicka or stamina regen outdoors. Eating skeever meat gives you a <20%> speed boost and restores <10> health, magicka and stamina per second for <180> seconds.

traits.name: Old Fashioned
traits.description: If it ain't broke, don't fix it. Weapons, armor and magical staves made of iron, wood, steel, fur or hide are <15%> stronger. Otherwise, they are <10%> weaker.

traits.name: Pacifist
traits.description: When your arms are lowered you restore <2> magicka and stamina per second. However, raising your hands in combat will have the opposite effect. Those born under the sign of the Atronach do not gain any benefits.

traits.name: Phalanx
traits.description: You deal <15%> more damage with spears, javelins, pikes, and halberds. However, you take <50%> more damage when hit from behind. Also gives you a unique pike.

traits.name: Plagued Mind
traits.description: Your undead summons and raised dead last <200%> longer. However, your magicka is reduced to <0> while a friendly summon is active.

traits.name: Quester
traits.description: Start with <50> less Health, Magicka and Stamina. Gain <5> of each per <3> quests completed, up to a maximum of <+150> at <450> quests completed.

traits.name: Rage
traits.description: You posses a natural fight response. When at less than <20%> health, you deal <20%> more damage and take <20%> less damage. However, you move <30%> slower when below this threshold.

traits.name: Self-Taught
traits.description: For every 3 books read, gain <1> point of magicka. However, you start with <100> less magicka.

traits.name: Serene Presence
traits.description: Your calming aura makes you effortlessly persuasive: persuasion checks almost always succeed, and pacifying spells are <20%> stronger. However, your intimidation attempts are half as likely to succeed, and your frenzy spells are <20%> weaker.

traits.name: Shehai
traits.description: Your bound weapons do <15%> more damage. But you take <25%> more damage from the undead.

traits.name: Silent Dovah
traits.description: You choose not to speak the Thu'um, instead hoarding the souls of slain dragons to fuel your own power. For each unspent dragon soul, you gain <+10> Health, Magicka, and Stamina. However, this draconic strength rejects the curse of beast or blood: werewolves and vampires cannot harness its power. Your persuasion and intimidation attempts are 30% less likely to succeed.

traits.name: Skilled
traits.description: Reading skill books grants an extra skill point and trainers cost <50%> less, however every <5> levels you don't gain a perk point.

traits.name: Soul Embed
traits.description: At will, you can consume a dragon soul to amplify the magnitude of your shouts by <50%> for <1> hour.

traits.name: Soul Reaver
traits.description: You've claimed countless souls for your gain. Weapon and armor enchantments are <10%> stronger and use <10%> less charge. Armor rating and weapon damage is reduced by <10%>.

traits.name: Sunkissed
traits.description: You draw strength from the sun's radiant blaze: sun spells are <15%> more powerful in your hands. But such warmth comes at a cost: you take <25%> more frost damage, and this weakness deepens to <50%> beneath the cold veil of night.

traits.name: Swimmer
traits.description: You prefer life on the water. In water, you swim <30%> faster, can breath underwater and regenerate health, stamina and magicka by a flat <1> per second. On land, you suffer <25%> less health, stamina and magicka regeneration.

effects.condition: recovery effect, duration scales with power

traits.name: The True Apprentice
traits.description: All spells cost <50%> less but are <40%> weaker or last <40%> shorter.

traits.name: Touch of the Arcane
traits.description: Your touch and cloak spells are <20%> stronger. All other spell types are <10%> weaker or last <10%> less.

traits.name: Unbound Hands
traits.description: Handwear constricts you. Spells are <15%> stronger and unarmed attacks do <+30> more damage when not wearing gloves/gauntlets. However, they suffer the opposite effect when wearing gloves/gauntlets.

traits.name: Unshakable
traits.description: You turn defense into offense. Your shield bashes deal <20%> more damage and cost <20%> less Stamina. However, your unwavering focus on your shield makes you slower while blocking.

effects.condition: while blocking, negative effect, recovery effect, scales with power

traits.name: Wandering Monk
traits.description: Power attacks with quarterstaves will force the enemy to drop their weapon to the ground, however this only applies if you're not wearing any armor (light or heavy). You also recieve a unique battlestaff.

traits.name: Way of the Voice
traits.description: You follow the pacifist creed of the Greybeards, and as such your hostile shouts are <30%> less effective, but using non-hostile shouts has a <20%> chance reset the shout cooldown.

traits.name: Witcher
traits.description: Potions and poisons you craft are <20%> more effective, and consuming raw ingredients grants double the effect. However, you can only benefit from up to <four> active potion effects at a time.

traits.name: Wizard's Wardrobe
traits.description: Your wands are <30%> more effective when wearing a wizard hat. When not wearing a wizard hat, all spells are <10%> less powerful or last <10%> less.

Fishing rods can be enchanted. However, your affinity with the waters leaves you <10%> more vulnerable to shock damage.
